snippet.title: ENDLESS™ Dungeon - Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-orders are now available for physical and digital editions of ENDLESS™ Dungeon on Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox and PlayStation! The game will release on May 18th.   Plus, if you pre-order the Last Wish Edition on PC you’ll get instant access to the “Final Rodeo” OpenDev. Get ready to test your mettle against new monsters and bosses with an all-new hero: Comrade!  

P.S. The game is still coming out on Nintendo Switch, with a release date to be announced soon.

Pre-Purchase the game here: https://store.endlessdungeon.game 
     NOTE: Retailers for the physical editions may take a few days to update their store fronts to include ENDLESS Dungeon. Stay tuned!

ENDLESS™ Dungeon is a rogue-lite tactical action game, set in the award-winning Endless universe. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into a long-abandoned space station, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters…  or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

Follow Endless Dungeon on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EndlessUniverse
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonoftheendless
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/amplitudestudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/endlessuniverse
